"use client" import { TrendingUp } from "lucide-react" import { PolarAngleAxis, PolarGrid, Radar, RadarChart } from "recharts" import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardFooter, CardHeader, CardTitle, } from "@/registry/default/ui/card" import { ChartConfig, ChartContainer, ChartTooltip, ChartTooltipContent, } from "@/registry/default/ui/chart" const chartData = [ { month: "January", desktop: 186 }, { month: "February", desktop: 305 }, { month: "March", desktop: 237 }, { month: "April", desktop: 203 }, { month: "May", desktop: 209 }, { month: "June", desktop: 214 }, ] const chartConfig = { desktop: { label: "Desktop", color: "hsl(var(--chart-1))", }, } satisfies ChartConfig export default function Component() { return ( Radar Chart - Grid Circle - No lines Showing total visitors for the last 6 months } />
Trending up by 5.2% this month
January - June 2024
) }
